job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Information Services
job.description: ltpgtWe are seeking a site reliability engineer SRE to build and manage highly reliable data platform infrastructure and applications Specifically we are searching for someone who brings fresh ideas demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint and enjoys collaborating with worldclass engineers to develop big data solutions and deliver positive user experiences at every interactionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRESPONSIBILITIESltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBuild software and systems to manage platform infrastructure and applicationsltligtltligtContinuous automation of operational processesltligtltligtProvide primary operational support and engineering for suite of SaaS toolsltligtltligtIntervene and remediate when systems and services deviate significantly from normal levelsltligtltligtWork with release engineers to ensure that the software delivery pipeline is as efficient as possibleltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPREFERRED PROFILEltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt35 years of relevant experience in operatingltligtltligtBSMS in Computer science or equivalentltligtltligtmediumscale distributed system in a cloud environmentltligtltligtExperience in Kubernetes Hadoop and Docker containersltligtltligtExperience in CICD  Jenkins Concourse toolsltligtltligtExperience in AWS Cloud Serverless technologiesltligtltligtExperience in building and deploying automation using scripting programming languagesltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
